nodes.text: The Leopard was a Gamma-class ATR-6 assault transport used by the Empire.

The Leopard was part of a strike force to capture XQ4 Platform RS-32 as the station contained Mag Pulse technology, that the Empire wanted during the Zaarin insurrection. When the station's shields were down and the platform disabled by Maarek Stele. The Leopard was the first transport to bring troops to capture the platform. Once the troops departed, the transport exited the battle into Hyperspace.
